description: Students continue to develop the listening, speaking, reading and writing skills that enable them to deal not only with topics of daily life, but also cultural themes and authentic materials. Class meets four times weekly. Individual language laboratory visits are also required. Offered annually in the spring semester. Prerequisite: JAPAN 231 or equivalent.
name: Intermed Japanese II
notes: Students in Japanese 232 must also register for one lab Japanese 232 AL or BL.
Class days and times are by arrangement.
title: Intermediate Japanese II
